仭字的基本解释

仭
rèn
古同“刃”。

仭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rèn］
［《廣韻》而振切，去震，日。］
亦作“仭1”。
(1)古代长度单位。七尺为一仞。一说，八尺为一仞。
(2)测量深度。
(3)“認”的古字。承认。
(4)“認”的古字。辨识。
(5)“認”的古字。认为，当作。
(6)通“韌”。柔软而坚固。
(7)通“忍”。
(8)通“牣”。满，充满。
(9)古地名。春秋楚地。在今湖北省均县境。

仭字的康熙字典解释
仭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
仭字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Si
rèn
Gu Tong "blade".
Si
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rèn］
["Guangyun" and vibrate, go to vibrate, day. ]
Also known as "仭1".
(1) Ancient unit of length. Seven feet is one ren. One said, eight feet is one ren.
(2) Measure the depth.
(3) The ancient word for "recognition". recognition.
(4) The ancient word for "recognition". Identify.
(5) The ancient word for "recognition". Think, treat.
(6) Through "toughness". Soft and strong.
(7) Through "forbearance".
(8) Link "Dao". Full, full.
(9) Ancient place names. Spring and Autumn Chu land. In today's Junxian County of Hubei Province.
